publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7338 Pauline McNeill: V&A At Dundee—That the Parliament congratulates Japanese architect Kengo Kuma, whose design has been chosen for the V&A museum planned for Dundee’s waterfront; pays tribute to the other architects shortlisted, and considers it important to bring the V&A museum to Dundee and to properly fund such a development. Supported by: Marlyn Glen*, Sarah Boyack*
S3M-7338 V&A At Dundee (lodged on 3 November 2010) Patricia Ferguson*, Jamie Hepburn*
